column3: NACK, why did you change the spacing so much?\n
I didn't change the spacing, Poedit did this. This is because it's easier to read, I think. But why should the spacing be a problem?\n
It isnt, I was just nitpicking, and it makes the commitdiff much harder to read, which isnt good...also, my poedit doesn't do that unless I put spaces in there.\n
